Author: BrandonM
Content:
For example, Brody notes one study where researchers gave asthmatic patients a drug that actually makes asthma worse. When they gave the drug to the patients, they told them that it relieves asthma.

Nice, just nice. Remind me never to participate in a research study.

Author: BrandonM
Content: Okay... if Linux's percentage increases, how is Apple killing Linux again?

Author: breily
Content: This doesn't seem surprising in the least given that Apple spends tons of money trying to make people switch and I'm sure most Linux developers couldn't care less if  windows users switch.

Content: Even if more than a thousand words are spoken in the interview? ;-)

Content:
